ygData.subject: Re: Prices
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Prices I ve seen for banded Bracers 5-6pp each Mask 8-10pp Tunic 15-25pp Sleeves 10-20pp Pants 10-35pp....I got lucky and bought mine for 10. Boots 10pp
ygData.messageBody:
>> What is everyone selling banded for (compiling list)
>
Prices I've seen for banded
Bracers 5-6pp each
Mask 8-10pp
Tunic 15-25pp
Sleeves 10-20pp
Pants 10-35pp....I got lucky and bought mine for 10.
Boots 10pp
Coif 15-20pp
Mantle 10-15pp

>On that note, what is everyone selling patchwork for as well?

It depends where you are. In the north by everfrost where pelts of all sizes are quite abundant generally 2gp per piece. On Faydwer in Greater Faydark it usually goes for 3gp a piece. I've sold a few pieces there for 4gp.

Good luck

Grimmlokk the happy warrior of E'ci
